Continuando com o clássico jogo Half life, depois de termina o primeiro jogo, dai suas expansões, então veio o Half Life 2 e pra continuar este belo game, cheguei ao episódio 1 do HL 2, jogo muito bom até agora, enredo bem muito bom, jogabilidade ótima, mas só tem uma pergunta, quem é o cara de terno que carrega uma pasta? kkkkkkkkkkkkk 2019 e nada da valve fala dele oficialmente, pelo menos eu não achei nada até exato momento deste comentário, mas enfim fico a um dia saber, enquanto isso, vou terminando sua sequência.

Episodio 1 es el que menos jugué. Tarda en arrancar y es corto. Y creo que es perfecto que así sea; ya que al no traer muchas cosas nuevas, y sentirse como Half-Life 2 comprimido a unas 4 horas, termina antes de volverse monótono. Con más énfasis en la historia, una vez que arranca posta, la tensión no para y termina para que arranques el Episodio 2 de una.

What can I say about episode one....I really dont like it for my own reasons. Enemies feel a bit too bullet spongy, my guns (with the exception of the spaz12, crossbow and rocket launcher) feel like they dont hit hard enough, the game feels like its keeping stuck in the city for way too long. I know its a sin to dislike half life but I really hated playing through episode one.

This game was close to being my first favorite of all 3 of the half life 2 games. The reason to why it is to me, the second worst half life 2 game, is because nothing felt new or alien to me. The core reason why I picked up this game was to get a concreate, blind experiance. This sequal did not manage to meet thoes expectations. However, the game is still okay. The graphics were delt a good card, so was the music and gameplay. Besides the lackluster of fun I had playing this game, I say it stands on a 7/10.

First playthrough and found the game as dazzling as the original hl2. 
Perfect blend of organic running and gunning and figuring out puzzles, and is full of surprises. The immersion this game creates is deep and its content is memorable. The cinematic moments sometimes shock without melodrama and can make you laugh with all kinds of humour (dark, or with naivete). There is something captivating about half life that makes it unique as an fps. There seems to be a harmony throughout the whole game, and the experience of playing it seems refreshing and to never become dull except after hours of playing. My only complaint is that the game is short for the price paid. But the start and ending left a great impression, and were memorable and was indicative of great storytelling through the medium of a video game. 
Its the kind of game which you go a long time without dying  thinking that its easy and then suddenly you do something stupid and it gets you killed, or enemies relentlessly pursue or attack you unexpectedly with intensity after you plow through dozens of enemies with ease  like Rambo on meth wielding akimbo uzi's using whatever means is neccesary. 
It keeps the game exciting, and combat is always interesting. The AI can be cunning or stupid, which makes it balanced. 
As a fraction to reflect the value for money and the quality of the content I would give 8/10 the 2/10 lost would be due to the length of Episode 1, and also the only new enemy I could identify is the Zombine. 
Id advise to buy the game to experience it as it is fun and made me happy to play in retrospect.

Es una exquicites de videjuego, la verdad recomiendo jugar toda la saga de Half life, son horas de juego mas aparte si uno se concentra en la historia le fascinara a demas y entendera los memes del Half life 3, pero la verdad una obra maestra y el padre de los fps modernos.

Perhaps not as good as the original fight, but it still has it moments. Some of the music is quiet good too. Still like the variety in weapons, even if they werent any new once .That you have Alyx as companion almost all the way trough is also pretty good. The last fight is pretty damn good. All in all quiet good and really  get the feeling that things has gone really bad regarding the place where the game takes place. Personally the length isnt a problem for me and is just fine enough.

besides that good game

Также, как и оригинальный Half-Life 2, первый эпизод держит игрока в непрерывном увлечении. Да и в целом, это всё тот же Half-Life 2. Интереснее, лучше, качественнее. Но не радует тот факт, что ничего нового я не увидел, идей никаких новых не воплотили. Игру это хуже не делает, но перепройти её не возникнет желания.
